/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of motion and dynamism. The street is lined with buildings and trees, creating a vibrant urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, adding a serene contrast to the busy scene below. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and the vastness of the sky. The colors in the image are bright and vibrant, reflecting the lively atmosphere of the city.
